summary.para: Adds files to an automatic content group in a content group map.

param.name: fileName
param.para: The name of the file to be added to the automatic content group.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Adds an automatic content group to the content group map.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a write-only object model for a content group map.
